formulas.raw: Historical Volatility Formula: \[\sigma = \sqrt{\frac{\sum_{i=1}^{n} (R_i - \bar{R})^2}{n - 1}}\] Where \(\sigma\) is the standard deviation of returns, \(R_i\) is the log return of day \(i\), and \(\bar{R}\) is the average return.
